title: [SOLVED]820-2610 lvds
message:
someone else worked on this and did a horrible job
i've tried cleaning up the lvds cuz i really don't want to replace it

i've tried each pin with tweezers and they all seem down fine, either that or the traces are starting to come up and wiggle but seem soldered to the pins
any idea which pin is bad?

I've played with it enough that everything is almost right but one of the RGB signals or clock or ground is still off. black on verbose mode is showing as green

title: [SOLVED]820-2610 lvds
message: Measure all LVDS pins on diode mode. But I'm afraid the connector is just fucked. Pull and replace.

title: [SOLVED]820-2610 lvds
message: melting the plastic with hot air just a little got it tight enough to work properly and hopefully last

title: [SOLVED]820-2610 lvds
message: You know this is not the proper way to fix this....
